column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I decided that I wanted to visit a town that was about an hour away from me .
#text=Rather than drive , I decided that it would be a good day to take a ride on the train .
#text=I made sure that I had all my things together and drove to the train station .
#text=I parked in the designated parking lot across the street , and went into the small station .
#text=I waited at the counter for a few minutes before an attendant strolled out from the office .
#text=She smiled and asked me where I would like to go .
#text=I told her that I 'd like a round trip ticket for today to the nearby town .
#text=She got on her computer to confirm my route and times , and I decided to purchase the tickets .
#text=I gave the attendant my money , and she put it in her drawer while my tickets printed off her printer .
#text=I thanked her , and set out the door to wait for my train .
#text=Shortly after I sat down , I could hear the sound of the train in the distance .
#text=Once it was stopped and unloaded , the conductor shouted all aboard !
#text=I boarded the train and set off .
#text=And that 's how I rode the train .
